channel.title: How to run client on mac?
channel.description: I download a client on Mac. Theres a file run.bat . i press on it and it show only 4 words or something . people tell me when u download a client how u start to play with the client?

item.title: How to run client on mac?
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

For mac, you need to open Terminal (Applications -> Utilities -> Terminal.app) cd to the directory of your client, then do javac *.java, after that do java client

Read full topic
item.source: How to run client on mac?
